content: > you need to know - how to make intarsia crochet - or tapestry crochet a pattern is created in the fabric by changing yarn/colors multiple times within a row by following a chart where each square represents a single_crochet you will know when to change colors size of the tapestry depends entirely on your gauge and uses yarn see below approximate size for sport yarn sport 12 wpi 22 stitches and 24 row = 10 cm in single_crochet 12 x 17 inch / 31 x 43 cm materials crochet hook u s size 2 5 mm crochet hook white sport weight cotton yarn 100g black sport weight cotton yarn 100g
